name: P2P.org [no slashing AVS]
description: Stay safe with P2P.org, a global (re)staking leader with $5B+ and 90K+ delegators. We take slashing risks seriously and won’t opt into AVS with slashing in the coming months. We’re conducting in-depth risk research, and once risks are clear, stress tests are complete, and the risk-reward is justified, we’ll notify users of any slashing plans, at least 1 month in advance via multiple channels.
